info.title: Authorization
info.description: Documentation of the authentication used for the 1NCE APIs.

post.description: Obtain a token for accessing other 1NCE API resources by using a POST request with a valid username and password combination for a 1NCE user account that has the permission to use the API.

grant_type.description: Grant Type of the requested access token. The default value is "client_credentials".

value.message: Auth header validation error: Missing attributes 'password'
Auth header validation error: Missing attributes 'username'
Request body validation error: Missing attributes 'grant_type'

Bearer_Token_200.title: Bearer Token 200 Response

status_code.description: Response HTTP status code for the executed request towards the 1NCE API. Status 200 indicates a successful request and response.

access_token.description: The generated Access Token for using as authentication token for other 1NCE API requests.

token_type.description: The type of token returned. The 1NCE API used Bearer tokens for general authentication.

expires_in.description: Time in seconds until the returned 1NCE API Bearer Token is expired and a new token has to be queryied.

userId.description: User ID type of the returned token.

scope.description: Scope access level of the returned token.

Bearer_Token_200.description: Response of querying the access token for the 1NCE API.

Bearer_Token_400.title: Bearer Token 400 Response

statusCode.description: HTTP status code 400 (Bad Request) indicating that there was an issue with the request towards the 1NCE API. Please double check the executed API request.

errorCode.description: String error code indicating the reference error.

message.description: String explanation of the error that occurred.
message.example: Auth header validation error: Missing attributes 'password'

Bearer_Token_400.description: Response of querying the access token for the 1NCE API.

BasicAuthentication.description: Basic authentication used for obtaining the Bearer Authentication Token. The Bearer Token can then be used to make any further API calls towards the 1NCE API.
